questions.quote: I don't know, but I gotta do this more often.Â   Ooh, there's my ride, finally.

Well so she mentioned that she had a son, and then for some reason, I launch into the story about the kid from Pennsylvania who was abducted.
Oh my God!  You know what I just realized?! If they get divorced an' live in two separate places? That's twice as many visits!
I've never seen him in Manhattan before; it's weird. So out of context.
I think what he's trying to say is that he's having a heart attack.
I'm glad you called, Elaine. I really needed to talk to someone.
Not with that big glass window looking out into the hall. I'd love a good nap. That's the only thing getting me out of bed in the morning. I'll see ya'.
